MyABC MyABC
Start Lesson About //Nada: add about_label Close Choose a Letter!
Welcome to MyABC application. 

 MyABC is an Android mobile application that supports fun alphabets learning to children.

 1- It provides letters of the alphabet (A through Z) along with photos, sounds, and words.
 2- It provides an attractive song video that facilitates the learning for children.
 3- The simple interface helps children focus on phonics and letters without accidentally exiting the lesson.
